backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, memory submission/editing, and memory retrieval with role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Report documenting a redeploy-only feature with associated files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REDEPLOY.md: Non-functional marker file used to trigger a fresh deployment and provide troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling password/welcome gates, chat mode routing, memory filtering, and main UI layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatFullPage.tsx: Full-screen chat page with header, chat card container, and footer; removes view param on close.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Interactive chat view supporting name setup, message submission, auto-scroll, and single/bulk delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ChatWidget.tsx: Floating chat launcher opening chat in a new tab, with an optional in-page chat panel toggle.
frontend/src/components/MemoryEditDialog: Dialog for editing an existing memory with validation for text and media uploads.
frontend/src/components/MemoryFullscreen: Fullscreen dialog showing detailed memory content with access control and edit permissions.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Renders a list of memories with cards supporting view, media preview, and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for submitting a new memory with text, author, and image/video upload validation.
frontend/src/components/MusicBoxWidget.t: Floating widget for uploading and playing audio files with size checks and playback controls.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: A login gate component collecting username and 4â€‘digit code with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PidduWidget.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/TingiWidget.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Modal video viewer that displays a video and shows an error alert if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: A welcome screen with hero image and buttons to continue or lock the app.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeLinksDial: Dialog for submitting and viewing YouTube links with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Hooks for fetching, submitting, and deleting chat messages using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatDisplayName.ts: Manages chat display name with session and local storage persistence and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and exposing auth functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, submit, and edit memories using a backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a username/password gate using session and local storage to persist unlock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that old Tingi search code was removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongs.ts: Adds hooks to load and upload songs through the backend actor, sorting by newest and refreshing cache on upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Manages a dismissible welcome gate using session storage with reset and dismiss functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeLinks.ts: Hooks for fetching and submitting YouTube links, sorted by timestamp, with cache invalidation on submit.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, typography, and scrollbar styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/audio.ts: Utility functions to convert audio files to Uint8Array and create data URLs with guessed MIME types.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including chat enhancements, UI rules, memory permissions, and known issues. Lists architectural notes and existing features for development planning.
